solution_line_template: Over {leak_duration} hours, a leak of {leak_rate} ounces per hour for {leak_duration} hours would generate {leak_rate}*{leak_duration}=<<{leak_rate}*{leak_duration}={leaked_volume}>>{leaked_volume} ounces.
A bucket that can hold twice the volume leaked is {leaked_volume}*{twice_factor}=<<{leaked_volume}*{twice_factor}={bucket_size}>>{bucket_size} ounces.
